title: Ep.28: Deshaun Watson Trade, Devante Adams, Bakers Next Stop, Steelers Playoff Hopes, and Much More!
description: In this episode we go over the blockbuster Deshaun Watson trade and how that shakes up not only the AFC north but the entire NFL. Did the Devante Adams trade actually make Green Bay better? Where will Baker Mayfields next stop be since there are only a couple teams left looking to trade for a QB. Are the Steelers now the worst team in the AFC north or does their defense give them a chance? Stay tuned! This coming week we will release our first mock draft! More things in the works. Follow "Amiwrongpodcast" on Instagram and Tik Tok and "amiwrong2019" on Twitter for more updates!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
